education: No formal schooling; self-taught from watching television
eyes: Usually blue; white with no pupils in true form
knownrelatives: William (father), unidentified mother, Brian Braddock (Captain Britain, husband), James Braddock (brother-in-law), Elizabeth Braddock (Psylocke, sister-in-law), Sir James Braddock (father-in-law, deceased), Lady Elizabeth Braddock (mother-in-law, deceased)
powers: Meggan is an empathic metamorph, her form changing at will or with her moods. She can be negatively affected by dark emotions, magic, pollution, or other corruptions of nature. She draws energy from the earth and other sources, enabling her to increase in size and strength, project force blasts, fly, and manipulate the elements. Her powers have been erroneously thought to be dependent on her proximity to Britain, but several trips to other countries with no ill effects refute this. Despite her magical affinity, she is not a fairy.
significantissues: First met Captain Britain (Mighty World of Marvel #14, 1984)
joined Excalibur (Excalibur: The Sword is Drawn, 1988)
searched for parents, met the Neuri (Excalibur Vol. 1 #44-46, 1995)
